import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { myAppContextUserInfo } from '../../Stores/UserInfoContext' import './User.css' import Pictures from '../../Pictures/Pictures' function User() { const userInfo = useContext(myAppContextUserInfo) return (

Mon profil

{userInfo.userInfo.firstname} {userInfo.userInfo.surname}

{new Date(userInfo.userInfo.birthday).toLocaleDateString("fr")}

{userInfo.userInfo.city} {userInfo.userInfo.cp}

{userInfo.userInfo.web_site}

Description : {userInfo.userInfo.description}

) } export default User
